#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>

void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = getchar_unlocked();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48);c = getchar_unlocked());
    for(;c>47;c = getchar_unlocked()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
int main()
{
	int n,t;
	scanint(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanint(n);
		printf("%d\n",(int)sqrt(n));
	}
	return 0;
}
